fast.description: Judge-safe profile (CPU-only, deterministic, offline-safe, <30s/doc). Uses PyMuPDF text extraction by default; PaddleOCR remains disabled unless explicitly enabled.

accurate.description: Accuracy-oriented profile. Intended for local runs where PaddleOCR models are already present. Use --enable-paddleocr to allow PaddleOCR in submission/judge/demo contexts.
